name: Maggie Gyllenhaal
summary:
Maggie Gyllenhaal. Actress: Secretary. Maggie Gyllenhaal was born on November 16, 1977 in New York City, New York as Margalit Ruth Gyllenhaal, the daughter of producer/screenwriter Naomi Foner and director Stephen Gyllenhaal, and the older sister of actor Jake Gyllenhaal. She is of Ashkenazi Jewish (mother) and Swedish, English, and German (father) descent.

She made her film debut in Waterland (1992). She had sporadic roles throughout her teenage years though she...
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars | 43 wins & 93 nominations total
